NHS-R Community

This is a recording from the NHS-R Community Conference 2020, Xaringan Slides (part 1). It was run on Tuesday 3nd of November by Silvia Canelon, postdoctoral research scientist in the Department of Biostatistics, Epidemiology, and Informatics at the University of Pennsylvania Perelman School of Medicine (https://silvia.rbind.io/)
. Laurie Baker,  Data Science Lecturer at Data Science campus, has supported this workshop. You can follow the trainers on Twitter:   / spcanelon   and   / llbaker1707  .
The video was not edited and might include time for exercises/breaks.

All materials can be found here: https://github.com/nhs-r-community/Conference_2020

Original materials: https://spcanelon.github.io/xaringan-basics-and-beyond/
